players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Bob was a good person, and I'm sad to see him go. We need to figure out who the mafioso is."
You: "I think we should investigate Charlie, he seemed a bit suspicious when Bob died."
Diana: "I'm just a grieving villager, I didn't kill Bob."
